questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the packaging's main design element?
What is the overall shape of the visible packaging surface?
What appears to be the primary material of the packaging?
Describing the texture, is the surface of the packaging glossy or matte?
What is the main typeface style used for the brand name and slogan?
What is the predominant color of the text on the packaging?
Does the packaging prominently feature any illustrative or graphic elements beyond text?
Considering the text, what is the nature of the product inside?
Judging by the text, what feeling or emotion is the product associated with?
What is the overall style of the text's presentation on the packaging?
Is there an image or logo besides text visible on the packaging?
Does the packaging use any special finishes or embossing techniques?
Is the text arranged horizontally or vertically on the packaging?
Considering its presentation, how would you describe the overall brand message?
Based on the text and layout, is the packaging design modern or traditional?
